testcase.classname: User able to click checkout button and payment page should be displayed
testcase.name: checkout
testcase.system-out: Given User visit Amazon main page...........................................passed When User search for "iphone"...............................................passed Then the search results are displayed.......................................passed And the first result has the word "iphone" in it............................passed Given User click Add to Cart the searched item..............................passed When User click proceed to checkout button..................................passed Then payment page should be displayed.......................................passed
